item.description: Hi there! I‚Äôm Diego, a Spanish Mobile Developer based in the warm sunny south of Spain. Seville is my home city and a beautiful place you should visit if haven‚Äôt done already. Ping me on twitter if you‚Äôre visiting and we can arrange some üçªif time permits. I‚Äôve been typing on keyboards since ‚Äò88, when my parents got me a nice cassette-loading, green-screen AMSTRAD CPC 464. Since then I‚Äôve been doing a lot of coding and just a few times I‚Äôve been proud of code punched by me.
